meanings.sent1: The stars were glitzing in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The disco ball was glitzing as it spun around the room.
meanings.sent3: The sequins on the dress were glitzing so much, they almost outshone the stage lights.
meanings.sent4: Her smile glitzed like a diamond in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline glitzed with a thousand twinkling lights.

meanings.definition: The act of adding glamour or sparkle to something
meanings.sent1: She added some glitzing to her outfit with a sparkly necklace.
meanings.sent2: The glitzing of the decorations made the party feel extra special.
meanings.sent3: The cake was covered in glitzing, making it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The glitzing of the stage transformed it into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The glitzing of the event made it a night to remember.
